sentences.en: What's the one word of advice a well-meaning professional would give to a recent college graduate?
sentences.cn: 一个好心的专业人士会给刚毕业的大学生什么样的忠告呢？

sentences.en: When well-meaning campaigners want us to pay attention to global warming, they often end up pitching beyond the facts.
sentences.cn: 当善意的活动人士希望我们关注全球变暖问题时，他们往往会言过其实。

sentences.en: Most parents are well-meaning, but some of them aren't very helpful with the problems their sons and daughters have in adjusting to college.
sentences.cn: 大多数父母都是善意的，但一些父母并不能很有力地帮助他们的儿女解决适应大学生活这一问题。
